segments.text: I can’t believe that boy is standing on that wobbly stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching for the cookie jar, and the stool looks like it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, like this is totally normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, completely oblivious to what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, and she’s just standing in it like it’s fine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone’s going to get hurt if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on those cookies, he doesn’t even notice how unstable he is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl realizes how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just asking for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
